name: Traffic Jammy
description:
Have you ever dreamed to direct traffic in a middle of a crossroad? 

The enormous responsibility that comes with it doesn't scare you?   

Achieve your dream with Traffic Jammy.  How long you will survive without an accident? 

A probably buggy game developed by Dani Desa for Weekly Game Jam 96 (really done in 2 days.. ).
